column4: User is on the registration page
column6: 1. Enter valid email, password and confirm password, 2. Click on the 'Register' button
column7: Account is created and user is redirected to the welcome page

sep=: Register a new account with an existing email
column4: User is on the registration page
column6: 1. Enter an existing email, password and confirm password, 2. Click on the 'Register' button
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that email is already in use

sep=: Login with valid email and password
column4: User is on the login page
column6: 1. Enter valid email and password, 2. Click on the 'Login' button
column7: User is logged in and redirected to the dashboard

sep=: Login with invalid email and password
column4: User is on the login page
column6: 1. Enter invalid email and password, 2. Click on the 'Login' button
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that email or password is incorrect

column4: User is on the password restore page
column6: 1. Enter a valid email address, 2. Click on the 'Send reset link' button, 3. Check email and click on the reset link, 4. Enter a new password and confirm password, 5. Click on the 'Reset password' button
column7: Password is reset and user is able to login with new password

sep=: Restore a password with an invalid email
column4: User is on the password restore page
column6: 1. Enter an invalid email address, 2. Click on the 'Send reset link' button
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that email is not found

column4: User is on the registration page
column6: 1. Enter a password that does not meet the requirements, 2. Observe the password strength indicator
column7: Password strength indicator shows that the password does not meet the requirements

column4: User is on the registration page
column6: 1. Click on the password visibility toggle, 2. Observe the password input field
column7: Password input field toggles between hidden and visible states

column4: User is on the registration page
column6: 1. Open the registration page in different browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge), 2. Attempt to register a new account
column7: Registration page functions correctly in all browsers

sep=: Verify compatibility with different screen sizes
column4: User is on the registration page
column6: 1. Resize the browser window to different screen sizes, 2. Observe the layout and functionality of the registration page
column7: Registration page functions correctly and layout adjusts correctly for different screen sizes
